title: Love Me
lyrics:
Damn Nigga She just love me Watch me ride by wanna f*ck me see me in the club wanna suck me guess that's why yamad and wanna bust me
When I come down they just love me certified playa they gone hate me true hood nigga I bet cha digg me got the money and the chain and you jocking me I'm a d-town representer I got the d behind me I'm so damn conceited I'm his soul enemy all day on the block and I'm grinding and I got a lil money and I'm shining
Damn Nigga She just love me Watch me ride by wanna f*ck me see me in the club wanna suck me guess that's why ya mad and wanna bust me, Damn Nigga She just love me Watch me ride by wanna f*ck me see me in the club wanna suck me guess that's why ya mad and wanna bust me
Open doors in the city you better peep me at first she didn't like me now she want me when I dropped it in the pot it was 53 when I took it back out it stretched to 83 big paper flippin it just end me I'm a nfl nigga ain't no changing me my momma miss RICKS she say she love me the girls do to but ain't no dougie
Damn Nigga She just love me Watch me ride by wanna f*ck me see me in the club wanna suck me guess that's why ya mad and wanna bust me, Damn Nigga She just love me Watch me ride by wanna f*ck me see me in the club wanna suck me guess that's why ya mad and wanna bust
All you dry ass niggas stay away from me to my nigga pimp c let him rest in peace you boys down here be jacking that's why damm d keep that thang with me I'm in the club lookin for a bad chick she can be independent or a section 8 chick I hustle hustle hustle I'm just so street big boy money boy damn d ya
Damn Nigga She just love me Watch me ride by wanna f*ck me see me in the club wanna suck me guess that's why ya mad and wanna bust me
When I hit the club I got rego with me and my boy run dun yea we live at g-gs I'm fly den a bitch yea I kno you see me you geekin geekin geekin on ecstasy man I'm on fire ain't no stoppin me nigga f*ck you, you gotta pay me dallas texas is my city just in me I'm bout to get money hata watch me
Damn Nigga She just love me Watch me ride by wanna f*ck me see me in the club wanna suck me guess that's why ya mama wanna f*ck me, Damn Nigga She just love me Watch me ride by wanna f*ck me see me in the club wanna suck me guess that's why ya mama wanna f*ck me, Damn Nigga She just love me Watch me ride by wanna f*ck me see me in the club wanna suck me guess that's why ya mama wanna f*ck me
